topComments.author: Julio
topComments.comment: Incredible tour around this area. I can‚Äôt rave about this place enough. I would definitely go back and learn more about this wonderful Necropolis.  Saqqara the ancient site of Memphis city; hence it abounds in monuments, antiques and tombs. It is the most ancient burial ground in ancient Egypt. Situated on a desert plateau crowned by Zoser step pyramid and its funerary complex including temples and tombs distinguished by glamorous wall engravings established by the architect Imhotep for King Zoser (Ill dynasty).
